document_data.name: Lucille
document_data.mainbody:
'''Lucille''' was a powerful [[pit fiend]], as well as the most trusted and loyal of [[Zariel]]'s generals.

{{Quote|Your pathetic bravado no longer serves you, mortal. I will kill you when I deem the moment right...When you've realized that all you fought for, all you strove for, is lost...|Lucille.}}
document_data.Description: She was a fearsome and terrible sight to behold on the battlefield.
document_data.Possessions: Lucille wore a frightening ''[[helm of devil command]]'' and carried a massive ''[[battle standard of infernal power]]'' while commanding her troops.
document_data.Relationships: Among the forces she led were a squad of a dozen [[spined devil]]s.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Lucille led Zariel's forces in the conflict to control the city of [[Elturel]], after it was pulled down into [[Avernus]] atop the [[River Styx]].
